metadata.title: CVE-2018-18829 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There exists a NULL pointer dereference in ff_vc1_parse_frame_header_adv invc1.c in Libav 12.3, which allows attackers to cause a denial-of-servicethrough a crafted aac file.

criterions.comment: qtwebengine-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
gst-libav1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
